text: Delusions of grandeur may refer to: * Grandiose delusions * Delusions of Grandeur (Fleming and John album) * Delusions of Grandeur (novel) * Delusions of Grandeur (Srl), a ready-to-wear fashion label based in Italy * Delusions of Grandeur (Circle II Circle album), 2008 * Delusions of Grandeur (film), a 1971 French film * Delusions of Grandeur (Sahg album), fourth studio album by the Norwegian band Sahg. * Delusions of Grandeur (Gucci Mane album), fourteenth studio album by American rapper Gucci Mane.
title: Delusions of grandeur (disambiguation)
